summary:
Big Ben is the famous clock tower in London, England, officially named Elizabeth Tower. It was built in 1859 and stands 316 feet tall. The clock has five bells, with the Great Bell, weighing 13.5 tons, being the most notable. The tower's design features Gothic Revival style and stone carvings.

Big Ben is a symbol of the UK and democracy, often seen in movies. It underwent renovation from 2017 to 2021, keeping the bells silent most of the time. The clock's mechanism is still original and is known for its accuracy, adjustable with pennies.
title: Big Ben
